channel.title: Help with Changing Stats On an Item
channel.description:
Ok, I know How to change the stats but I would like to know if there is a way to make a NO hit sheild? So I Can give it to one of my admins as a late christmas gift lol (he allways gets owned) .. So is there any way to make make something so the player never dies? IS that possible?? I know how to make a One hit weapon but I dont want that in this server.
I am a noob So I am playing with other ppls servers codes, I realy dont know what is the best base or starter server yet, but I am learning... Hopefully soon I can make my own server ^_^ Just so you know I do give credit to the correct people lol I dont like it when I dont get credit for something. SO I allways give credit to the ppl that help!!!!
Any Help would be GREAT!!!
Thanks inadvanced for any help
Adam[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2008, 11:43:31 am[/size][hr]It looks Like I can not make some one have unlimited health or just something for NO hit lol
Hope some one can help lol
Adam

item.title: Help with Changing Stats On an Item
item.dc:creator: @adam3d90s adam3d90s
item.description:
@adam3d90s wrote:

Thank YOU!!!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 11:15:56 am[/size][hr]Member: Problem, Is that temp?? it looks like it will wear off (not fast but it does look like it will wear off…) or is it just me?

So it looks like there is no ultamate sheild if there is could some one tell me how to code it?

Thank you !

Adam

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Changing Stats On an Item

item.title: Help with Changing Stats On an Item
item.dc:creator: @Problem Problem
item.description:
@Problem wrote:

Charactesr —>> Search Account name —>> Ctrl +F and find

character-skill = 3 CHANGETHISTO 99999 CHANGETHISTO 300000000

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Changing Stats On an Item
